attributes.action: Ban employers from using temps to fill vacancies ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employers are using agency staff and staff on fixed term contracts to avoid having to pay redudancy and other benefits. Using temps is undercutting the pay and conditions full time staff and adding to the countries unemployment.  I am proposing that employers should only be able to use agency staff and fixed term contracts to cover maternity or sick leave.
